text: Home and Away (often called H&A;) is an Australian soap opera that has been made in Sydney by the Seven Network since July 1987. The show first aired on 17 January 1988 with a two hour pilot. It is set in Summer Bay, a fictional town in New South Wales. It stars Samara Weaving with Jessica Falkholt and Cornelia Frances. Some of the characters in the show are John, Braxton, Heath, Alf, Irene and Matilda. == Other websites == * Category:1988 television series debuts Category:1980s soap operas Category:1990s soap operas Category:2000s Australian television series Category:2000s soap operas Category:2010s soap operas Category:New South Wales Category:1988 establishments in Australia Category:English-language television programs
title: Home and Away
